data.message: I never want to hear the best rapper ever argument again. It is Eminem.

replies.message: 2pac
Lyrics wise eminem is better but PAC put his heart in his Songs and pac has a better flow
Nasir
Never ever always Em
Are you sayin' Em doesn't put his heart into his songs? If so, you might wanna listen again. No disrespect to 2pac, but Eminem has tonnes of flow & puts so much into everything he does.
2pac yall mf stans
@Ben Regnall you love ur slim shady dont you lol fucking beat it
white is RIGHT!!

Em will never,Reach pac sure em puts his heart in his mom ex songs and his childhood but aint that enough to match what pac brougt to the culture Society songs love G's etc. so sit the,fuck,down u fuckin stans And listen to the,same lyrics in,diff,ways.
Tech N9ne would like to say hello~
^^i agree^^
Was this ever a debate? Anyone who doesn't think Em is the best probably has the education level of a 10 year old
Lol at these hipster still saying 2pac's the best...Lyrically wise even Biggy would have destroyed him. But still 2pac=Top 10 best rappers ever
Fuck What everybody says But you got to admit Eminem Is The Best Rapper Ever. #RapGod

I know more than 20 underground rappers who are very dope but not even one them comes close to being a fucking lyrical genius like eminem...so fuck yeah Eminen is the greatest rapper to have ever lived

Em is top 10 no doubt but oat i put nas biggie pac rakim krsone and big l over em, its cool of you dont, but if u dont know any of the mcs i listed dont come in all fuck everyone ems the goat when you dont know ur shit.
andre 3000 > eminem. sorry.
Pacs got more emotion, nas has amazing flow, biggie has great narrative, em has all of those but not as well as them, hes better at technical rhyme schemes when it comes to lyricism.
Some bandwagon stans in every em related thing smh  but half dont know showbiz & ag
I don't know how they keep comin up with this Pac shit.  Biggy was better when they were alive.  Death made Pac a legend.

Fuck off with tech n9ne. He's not even in the debate
It is not about who is the best fuckin rapper of all time. It is all about who change this fuckin world !
Eminem got the lines,wordplays,vocabs,energy,delivery,rhyming schemes and creativity.He is the G.O.A.T. I love Pac,Biggie,Nas,Big L,Rakim etc but Eminem is number 1
